rationale: The segment contains Q3 scale/metric ('More than 1.3 million chickens are being slaughtered') and Q2 loaded metaphor ('take a toll'), not a Q1 cue.
statement_text: More than 1.3 million chickens are being slaughtered on an Ohio egg farm as the bird flu continues to take a toll on the industry.
